main event: An object with an orange glow was observed in the sky over Memphis, Tennessee, on June 14, 1954.
interesting points: The object had an oval shape and was approximately 7 feet across at arms length., It was reported that the object merged into a point before disappearing., The sighting lasted for about 5-10 minutes., The object was fast, moving towards the north and appeared to hover before vanishing., The observation was made by a civilian, with no associated photographs available.
